text: Exacum caeruleum is a species of plant in the Gentianaceae family. It is endemic to Yemen. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== caeruleum Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Exacum caeruleum
